titleStmt.title: Abba father: or, a plaine and short direction concerning priuate prayer Also, sundry godly admonitions concerning time, and the well vsing of it. By Elnathan Parr, minister of the word.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Elnathan, d. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F. K[ingston] for Samuel Man, and are to be sold at the signe of the Swan, in Pauls church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some pages tightly bound.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Swan, in Pauls church-yard
